As [Role] 
i need  A Service
So  that i can do somthing with it

### Details ans Assumption

- Any Assumtions

 ### Acceptance Criteria  
   
 ```gherkin
 Given [some context]
 When [certain action is taken]
 Then [the outcome of action is observed]
 ```
